channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Billy Strings Covers King Of The Hill Theme For New Reboot
item.description: 🎸🌟 Rock meets animation! @BillyStrings gives the King of the Hill theme a bluegrass twist in a whimsical new reboot collaboration. #MusicNews #BillyStrings #KingOfTheHill 🎶📺

item.title: Jack White Completes “Longtime Mission” of Attending Baseball Game at Every Major League Stadium
item.description: Jack White swings for the fences! 🎸⚾️ Living out his baseball dream, one stadium at a time. #RockAndRollMeetsBaseball

item.title: Myke Towers Unveils ‘Island Boyz,’ His Most Ambitious Album Yet
item.description: 🌴 Myke Towers takes us on a tropical journey with 'Island Boyz' 🎶🔥 Dive into his latest musical adventure! #MykeTowers #IslandBoyz

item.title: KennyHoopla Announces New conditions of an orphan// EP: Hear “orphan//”
item.description: 🎶 Fresh tunes alert! 🚨 KennyHoopla drops new EP "conditions of an orphan//". Hit play now! 🔥🎸 #NewMusic #KennyHoopla #EPDrop

item.title: Doechii Announces 2025 North American Tour
item.description: 🎉 Let's get ready to party with Doechii on her 2025 North American Tour! 🎶 Who's joining the fun? #DoechiiTour2025
